pkgmetadata.longdescription: Nonparametric Varying Coefficient Spike-and-Slab Lasso // Fits Bayesian regularized varying coefficient models with the Nonparametric Varying Coefficient Spike-and-Slab Lasso (NVC- SSL) introduced by Bai et al. (2023) arXiv:1907.06477. Functions to fit frequentist penalized varying coefficients are also provided, with the option of employing the group lasso penalty of Yuan and Lin (2006) doi:10.1111/j.1467-9868.2005.00532.x, the group minimax concave penalty (MCP) of Breheny and Huang doi:10.1007/s11222-013-9424-2, or the group smoothly clipped absolute deviation (SCAD) penalty of Breheny and Huang (2015) doi:10.1007/s11222-013-9424-2.
